languages.text:
An eerie and unfathomable haze obscures the vessel.
Enemies suffer a −25% penalty to hit chance when attacking from within a 2-cell range and a −75% penalty to hit chance when attacking from outside that range.
The field is removed upon firing and has a chance to be reengaged at the start of the ship's turn.
languages.original_text:
Зловещий мутный туман вокруг судна, сквозь который едва ли возможно что-то рассмотреть.
Атакующий получает −25% штраф к шансу попадания на расстоянии 2 клеток и −75% штраф, если расстояние до цели больше.
Поле спадает после выстрела и восстанавливается в начале следующего хода судна.

traits.locale_text:
An eerie and unfathomable haze obscures the vessel.
Enemies suffer a −25% penalty to hit chance when attacking from within a 2-cell range and a −75% hit chance penalty to hit chance when attacking from outside that range.
The field is removed upon firing and has a chance to be reengaged at the start of the ship's turn.

The field is removed upon firing and has a chance to be reengaged at the start of the ship's turn.

The field is removed upon firing and has a chance to be reengaged at the start of the ship's turn.

An eerie and unfathomable haze obscures the vessel.
Enemies suffer a −25% penalty to hit chance when attacking from within a 2-cell range and a −75% penalty to hit chance when attacking from outside that range.
The field is removed upon firing and has a chance to be reengaged at the start of the ship's turn.

languages.text:
Зловещий мутный туман вокруг судна, сквозь который едва ли возможно что-то рассмотреть.
Атакующий получает −25% штраф к шансу попадания на расстоянии 2 клеток и −75% штраф, если расстояние до цели больше.
Поле спадает после выстрела и восстанавливается в начале следующего хода судна.

Ein unheimlicher und undurchschaubarer Nebel verdunkelt das Schiff.
Feinde erleiden einen Abzug von −25 % auf die Trefferchance, wenn sie innerhalb eines Radius von 2 Feldern angreifen, und einen Abzug von -75 % auf die Trefferchance, wenn sie außerhalb dieses Radius angreifen.
Das Feld wird beim Feuern entfernt und hat die Chance, zu Beginn des Schiffszugs reaktiviert zu werden.
languages.original_text:
An eerie and unfathomable haze obscures the vessel.
Enemies suffer a −25% penalty to hit chance when attacking from within a 2-cell range and a −75% penalty to hit chance when attacking from outside that range.
The field is removed upon firing and has a chance to be reengaged at the start of the ship's turn.

traits.locale_text:
Ein unheimlicher und undurchschaubarer Nebel verdunkelt das Schiff.
Feinde erleiden einen {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −25 % auf die {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}Trefferchance{/g}, wenn sie von innerhalb eines 2-Felder-{g|Encyclopedia:Range}Radius{/g} angreifen, und einen Abzug von −75 % auf die {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}Trefferchance{/g}, wenn sie von außerhalb dieses Radius angreifen.
Der Schild wird beim Feuern entfernt und hat die Chance, zu Beginn des {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Schiffszugs{/g} wieder aktiviert zu werden.

languages.text:
Une brume étrange et insondable obscurcit le vaisseau.
Les ennemis subissent une pénalité de −25 % aux chances de toucher lorsqu'ils attaquent dans une portée de 2 cases et une pénalité de −75 % aux chances de toucher lorsqu'ils attaquent en dehors de cette portée.
Le champ est supprimé au moment du tir et peut réapparaître au début du tour du vaisseau.
languages.original_text:
An eerie and unfathomable haze obscures the vessel.
Enemies suffer a −25% penalty to hit chance when attacking from within a 2-cell range and a −75% penalty to hit chance when attacking from outside that range.
The field is removed upon firing and has a chance to be reengaged at the start of the ship's turn.

traits.locale_text:
Une brume étrange et insondable obscurcit le vaisseau.
Les ennemis subissent une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de -25 % en termes de {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}chances d'infliger un coup{/g} lorsqu'ils attaquent dans une {g|Encyclopedia:Range}portée{/g} de 2 cases et une pénalité de -75 % en termes de chances d'{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}infliger un coup{/g} lorsqu'ils attaquent en dehors de cette portée.
Le champ est supprimé au moment du tir et peut réapparaître au début du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} du vaisseau.

languages.text:
整艘舰船隐藏在深不可测的阴森雾气之中。
当敌人从2格之内的区域进行攻击时，命中率会受到−25%减值。当敌人从2格之外的区域进行攻击时，命中率会受到-75%减值。
舰船开火时，暗影领域会失效。当舰船回合开始时，有一定几率会重新激活。
languages.original_text:
An eerie and unfathomable haze obscures the vessel.
Enemies suffer a −25% penalty to hit chance when attacking from within a 2-cell range and a −75% penalty to hit chance when attacking from outside that range.
The field is removed upon firing and has a chance to be reengaged at the start of the ship's turn.

languages.text:
Una niebla sobrenatural e incomprensible envuelve la nave.
Los enemigos sufren una penalización del −25 % a su probabilidad de impacto al atacar desde una distancia de 2 casillas y una penalización del −75 % a su probabilidad de impacto al atacar desde fuera de ese alcance.
El campo se elimina al disparar y puede reactivarse al principio del turno de la nave.
languages.original_text:
An eerie and unfathomable haze obscures the vessel.
Enemies suffer a −25% penalty to hit chance when attacking from within a 2-cell range and a −75% penalty to hit chance when attacking from outside that range.
The field is removed upon firing and has a chance to be reengaged at the start of the ship's turn.

traits.locale_text:
Una niebla sobrenatural e incomprensible envuelve la nave.
Los enemigos sufren una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} del -25 % a su {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}probabilidad de impacto{/g} al atacar desde una {g|Encyclopedia:Range}distancia{/g} de 2 casillas y una penalización del −75 % a su probabilidad de {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}impacto{/g} al atacar desde fuera de ese alcance.
El campo se elimina al disparar y puede reactivarse al principio del {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} de la nave.

languages.text:
不気味で底知れぬ靄が船を覆い隠している。
2セル以内からの攻撃時、敵は命中率に−25%のペナルティを受ける。それ以上の距離から攻撃時、命中率に−75%のペナルティを受ける。
このフィールドは射撃時に解除され、艦のターン開始時に一定確率で再起動する。
languages.original_text:
An eerie and unfathomable haze obscures the vessel.
Enemies suffer a −25% penalty to hit chance when attacking from within a 2-cell range and a −75% penalty to hit chance when attacking from outside that range.
The field is removed upon firing and has a chance to be reengaged at the start of the ship's turn.

traits.locale_text:
不気味で底知れぬ靄が船を覆い隠している。
2セル以内からの攻撃時、敵は{g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}命中率{/g}に-25%の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を受ける。それ以上の{g|Encyclopedia:Range}距離{/g}から攻撃時、{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}率に-75%のペナルティを受ける。
このフィールドは射撃時に解除され、艦の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時に一定確率で再起動する。

languages.text:
Geminin çevresini tekinsiz ve esrarengiz bir pus kaplar.
Düşmanlar 2 hücrelik menzil içinden saldırırken vuruş olasılığına −%25, bu menzilin dışından saldırırken ise vuruş olasılığına −%75 ceza puanı alırlar.
Alan, ateş edildiğinde ortadan kalkar. Alanın geminin turu başladığında yeniden devreye girme olasılığı bulunur.
languages.original_text:
